parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the post.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>False. The post refers to Iulian Marcu, the mayor of Ungheni, Iași.  While he might be affiliated with a political party, the post itself does not explicitly mention any parliamentary candidacy or promote his involvement in the parliamentary elections. The post focuses on celebrating the Romanian National Day.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. The post is a public Facebook post, paid for by Moldova Invest, and addresses "Dragi cetățeni" (Dear citizens), clearly intending to reach a wide audience.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>False. The primary objective of the post is to convey a message of national unity and celebration on the occasion of Romania's National Day. There is no explicit or implicit call to vote for or against any candidate. The mention of Iulian Marcu is incidental to the main message, and his role as mayor is not directly linked to the parliamentary elections.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>True. The post can be considered a form of citizen journalism, conveying a message from a public figure on a significant national event. It does not contain biased information or attempt to sway public opinion towards a specific candidate.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. The message is not a personal opinion but a formal message from the mayor of Ungheni on a national holiday. It is not intended to influence the vote in any way.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1124584082386127</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, paid for by Moldova Invest, features a message from Iulian Marcu, the mayor of Ungheni, Iași, wishing citizens a happy Romanian National Day.  While Marcu holds a political office, the post's content is not related to the parliamentary elections. It focuses on national unity and celebration, not on influencing voters.  The mention of Marcu is incidental and does not constitute electoral propaganda. The post does not meet the criteria of Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006, as it does not directly refer to a parliamentary candidate, does not have an electoral objective, and does not exceed the limits of journalistic information.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>FALSE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates/>
<responsible-party-or-group>Moldova Invest</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police/>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
